Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi asizange sithumele umphrofethi edolobheni ngaphandle kokuthi sabamba abantu balo (idolobha) ngenhlupheko nobunzima mhlawumbe ukuze bazithobe
Sabe sesishintsha esikhundleni sokubi ngokuhle kwaze kwaba bayanda futhi bathi, â€œobaba bethu bathintwa ubunzima nenjabulo ngakho-ke sabathatha ngokuzamayo ngesikhathi benganakile

Futhi uma abantu bamadolobha babekholiwe futhi benza ubuqotho ngempela sasizobavulela izibusiso ezivela ezulwini nasemhlabeni kepha banqaba ngakho-ke sabathatha ngenxa yalokho ababekuzuza (ababekwenza)
Kungabe bazizwa bephephile yini abantu basemadolobheni maqondana nokuthi kuze kubona isijeziso sethu ebusuku ngesikhathi bona belele na
Noma ngakube bazizwa bephephile yini abantu basemadolobheni maqondana nokuthi kuze kubona isijeziso sethu ekuseni ngesikhathi bona bedlala na
Ngakube bazizwa bephephile ecebweni likaMvelinqangi, kepha akukho namunye ophephile ecebweni likaMvelinqangi ngaphandle kwabantu abalahlekelweyo
